name: Recidivism
description:
Recidivism is a 2D action minigame, where you can attack, make it into a combo with the right timing, evade, and position yourself. Manage your Stamina and Health to break the loop you're stuck in.

This was the finished product of my Major Project. I wanted to focus and learn how to translate FromSoftware's combat and stamina usage, into a 2D small boss fight.
I focused on visual cues that anticipate attacks, windups, i-frames, attempting to simulate the gameplay-loop and design of a Soulsborne game.

So go forth, death is part of the experience.

Art: by the amazing https://itch.io/profile/penusbmic (please try out their assets!)

Programming & Design: Daniel R. Salas S.
